# Exploring `mpg` and `disp` in `mtcars` Dataset

Let's investigate the relationship between fuel efficiency (`mpg`) and engine displacement (`disp`) from the `mtcars` dataset.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load mtcars dataset
mtcars = sns.load_dataset('mpg').dropna()

# Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 5))
sns.scatterplot(data=mtcars, x='mpg', y='displacement', color='orchid')
plt.title("MPG vs Displacement")
plt.xlabel("Miles per Gallon (mpg)")
plt.ylabel("Engine Displacement (disp)")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```
